channel.title: I need help!
channel.description: hey my 525 rsps is doing okay but when you go onto the skill cape shop with NO money its fine and you see all the 99 capes you can have but when you go get some money and have it in your inventory and try and talk to the wise old man (99 cape seller) it crashes and you have to close and re run the client and no one can buy any skill capes can somone help me (:

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @Jamie221 Jamie221
item.description:
@Jamie221 wrote:

hey my 525 rsps is doing okay but when you go onto the skill cape shop with NO money its fine and you see all the 99 capes you can have but when you go get some money and have it in your inventory and try and talk to the wise old man (99 cape seller) it crashes and you have to close and re run the client and no one can buy any skill capes can somone help me (:
